name: auth-signup-form
description: Registration form with validation, password strength meter, terms checkbox, and OAuth buttons
postMessage:
Signup form installed!

Usage:
import { SignupForm } from '@/components/auth-signup-form/signup-form'

<SignupForm onSubmit={async (data) => { /* your registration logic */ }} />

Requires shadcn/ui: npx shadcn@latest add button input card label checkbox
